DOC.brief_summary: The immediate post cesarean section IUD insertion is a further step towards spreading more compliance to females in developing countries, with rapid increase in population size
DOC.criteria: Females desiring contraception by using intrauterine device following their vaginal delivery or cesarean section refusal to participate in the study desiring other methods of contraception will not use any method of contraception has a contraindication for the use of IUD as bicornuate or septate uterus, sub mucous myomas, etc.
